entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
